topup.intro.title: Top up your account
topup.intro.body: Now that you’ve set up your account, you’ll need Evmos tokens to access and interact with a huge catalog of decentralized apps (dApps), such as games 🎮, marketplaces 🏪, decentralized finance (DeFi) 💸, and more!
topup.onboard.title: Onboard to Evmos
